name: Super Intern
tagline: First customizable AI agent in group chats, for work and fun
description: Super Intern is your AI teammate inside group chats. It reminds, answers, creates, and takes action seamlessly in context. From running communities, enhancing teams, to organizing events or just having fun with friends, it keeps conversations flowing.

name: Krisp AI Note Taker
tagline: Capture online + in-person meetings with better audio
description: Meetings donâ€™t wait. Neither should your notes. Krispâ€™s mobile app records any conversation, transcribes, and delivers summaries and action items in 16+ languages. Join with the Krisp Bot, or tap to capture live voice notes. All transcripts sync to desktop.

name: Vercel Domains
tagline: Fastest domain search on the planet with at cost pricing
description: Search, register, and manage domain names with Vercel. Find the perfect domain for your next project with instant availability checks, competitive pricing, and seamless integration with your Vercel deployments.

name: DayDrift
tagline: Organize your week with gentle focus
description: DayDrift helps you plan and track your daily tasks with a clean, minimal approach to productivity. Organize your todos by day of the week and watch your progress unfold naturally.

name: SSENSELESS
tagline: Try on anyone
description: Tariffs got you down? Now everyone can become SSENSELESS with a photo.

name: Strix
tagline: Open-source AI hackers for your apps
description: Strix is an open-source AI hacking agent that finds real security vulnerabilities, validates them with PoCs, and generates detailed reports. Used by top security teams, bug bounty hunters & auditors to automate penetration testing in hours instead of weeks.

name: Arc by Inversion
tagline: Making space a transportation layer for earth
description: Arc by Inversion is a reusable, space-based vehicle that delivers cargo anywhere on Earth in under an hour. Pre-positioned in orbit, Arc creates a new on-demand logistics domain from space, offering unprecedented speed and global access for critical missions.

name: Focus Session by SyncTasks
tagline: A distraction-free mode for your tasks
description: Select your tasks and enter a distraction-free mode. Designed to help you focus on one task at a time, avoiding distractions and multitasking.

name: solveit
tagline: New course and AI platform from Jeremy Howard and Eric Ries
description: Ever tried to build something with AI and gotten stuck? You're not alone. The initial results look promising. But then comes the hard part: making changes, adding features, building something real. To build real things, you need to understand how they work.

name: Grain Desktop Capture
tagline: AI meeting notes without bots
description: Get AI notes everywhere, no bot required. Grain Desktop Capture transcribes meetings by capturing audio from your Mac. Perfect for Slack Huddles, ad-hoc calls, and in-person conversations. First app to offer both bot-free notes and video recording.

name: Octave 2 by Hume AI
tagline: The next-generation multilingual text-to-speech model
description: Introducing Octave 2. Whatâ€™s new: - Fluent in 11+ languages - 40% faster (<200ms latencyâ â ) & 50% cheaper than Octave 1 - Multi-speaker conversation - More reliable pronunciation - New voice conversion & phoneme editing capabilities

name: LFM2-Audio
tagline: Real-time audio conversations on-device
description: LFM2-Audio defines a new class of audio foundation models: lightweight, multimodal, and real-time. By unifying audio understanding and generation in one compact system, it enables conversational AI on devices where speed, privacy, and efficiency matter most.

name: WhereFlight
tagline: Flight tracking made simple
description: Flight tracking with WhereFlight AI. Flight summaries, flight performance score, delay charts, flight path & history powered by AI.

name: Rolodex
tagline: One place to manage your teamâ€™s most important relationships
description: Rolodex is a relationship intelligence platform that helps teams consolidate, organize, and activate their collective network. Sync contacts from LinkedIn, email, and calendars, visualize connections, and collaborate on key relationships â€” all in one place.

name: Proxly
tagline: The smart browser chooser for macOS
description: I built Proxly to fix my own browser chaos. Now it can fix yours too. ðŸš€ Let Proxly route your links intelligently to the right browser based on your custom rules. Supports browser profiles, multiple domain constraints, source app constraints, Focus modes.

name: Schedulist 2.0
tagline: Unleashing a new level of productivity
description: We're happy to give you Schedulist 2.0! This time we're adding integrations with Linear, Microsoft ToDo and Google Tasks. We also add ShareSheet support and improving performance by a ton. Let us know what you think! ðŸš€

name: Treasury
tagline: The personal finance app built for you
description: Treasury is the personal finance app built for you â€” bridging the gap between rigid finance apps and messy spreadsheets. Budget your way, faster. ðŸš€

name: BSCheck.com
tagline: AI Fact Checker: Truth, One Click Away
description: BSCheck is a browser tool that quickly checks facts as you read. It helps you cut through the noise, spot misleading claims, and feel confident about whatâ€™s real online - without the extra hassle.

name: CoolKatz
tagline: Design + code on demand
description: On-demand product design and full-stack development for a flat monthly fee. Fast, reliable, and handled entirely by our two-person team.

name: Probility
tagline: AI-driven API performance testing made simple
description: AI-driven API performance testing with advanced load testing, real-time analytics, and intelligent test generation. Scale to thousands of virtual users.
